author: Press
title: CR2 Welcomes Tammo van Leeuwen as Market Strategy Director
text:
(MENAFN Press) DUBLIN and DUBAI, August 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --

CR2 is pleased to announce the appointment of Mr. Tammo van Leeuwen as Market Strategy Director. In this position and as a member of the Executive Committee, Tammo will be overseeing CR2's Marketing, Product Management & Thought Leadership activities. Tammo will primarily contribute to steering CR2 in its next frontier of growth and innovation with a reinforced product strategy.

Tammo has many years' experience in the banking software space, with a specialisation in linking technology and business concepts in an effective manner. Tammo has gained significant tenure in both sales and marketing with a strong background in the international expansion of financial software businesses. He is a regular speaker and moderator at international banking events and has been a member of the international jury of the EFMA Award - 'Best Mortgage Product of the Year'. 

Previous positions include Manager of Market Development, Director of Product Market Strategy at Sopra Banking Software and International Account Director at Business Architects International.

Franky Van Damme, CEO at CR2 has welcomed Tammo advising that - "He is the ideal candidate to truly reinforce the product strategy at CR2. With his many years' experience and proven expertise in the field, we look forward to his contribution and seeing the impact it will have across marketing, product management and thought leadership. On boarding Tammo heralds a new chapter in terms of organisational structure and product strategy, which we expect to be felt positively by both our existing customer base and future prospects."

On his recent appointment, Tammo has commented - "I have welcomed taking up my new role at CR2 - it is an ambitious company with a product suite to match. I look forward to working with my colleagues and our valued customers alike with regard to shaping and defining the CR2 product strategy. The company is at an exciting stage of growth, and I plan to make a valuable impact in terms of ensuring CR2's product strategy is in line with future objectives."

About CR2 

CR2 delivers BankWorld, a self-service banking platform that has revolutionised the interaction between the customer and bank at every point of contact. CR2's omnichannel platform helps deliver the right product, at the right time, in the right place across channels including ATM, Internet, Mobile, Kiosk and POS. Headquartered in Ireland, CR2 has more than 100 customers in over 60 countries worldwide. http://www.cr2.com
